title: Europa Barbarorum + 1.2 patch + Optional Mods
description:
You need Rome Total War with Barbarian Invasion (Optional Alexander addon) to be able to play Europa Barbarorum. 

This torrent has the installs for:

Europa Barbarorum 1.1
Europa Barbarorum 1.2 patch


The mods I have included here: 


1.2 Europa Barbarorum Fixes
AI Battle Formations Mods
Better Looking Map Borders (strat map only) - if anyone has something similar, please share!
Europa Barbarorum Extended Quotes for EB
Extended Unit Info version 1.1
Force Diplomacy for 1.2 EB
Instructions for adding new units to factions
Spoils of Victory 1.2
Added factions victory conditions
RS Environmet for EB 1.2



I have tested and used all those mods and work ok with EB 1.2. If you have others please post a link here and I will add them to the pack. 
If anyone has other mods on their HDDs and would like to share them I will add them here. Hope we can make a compile them, because there are a lot of mods that we're great and files just simply got lost, which is sad, really.

Everything is virus free, tested and the game should work well. If you have any problems, let me know in the comments.


Enjoy,
Have a nice day!
